entry.title: Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (11)
entry.content:
Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (11)20150911
I played for a long time over a bunch of chunks today. I'm trying
to rush through a bit to get to Metal Gear, which I feel a little
bad about, but the game doesn't really support a way to rush that
much. I finished the Hemwick *REDACTED*nel Lane area and managed to beat
the boss on my first try. After that I enabled a bunch of runes
and then when to fight the Vicar. I managed to kill her on my
first try back, which was pretty awesome and tense. After that I
went and did everything in the Hypogean Gaol, which was pretty
tense to explore. I fought that boss and it took maybe three or
four tries. I finally beat it by not using lock-on and using Fire
paper. After that I went over to the Lecture Building and explored
the whole thing. I was about to go to the Nightmare Frontier, but
then I decided to do my first Chalice dungeon. I beat the first
boss on the first try, but the whole area was really easy given
how strong I am now.

This game is super awesome!

Total time: 17:57
  • Video Games
  • Bloodborne
  • PS4
  • 2015

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 33 - The Legend of a Dragon
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 33 - The Legend of a Dragon20150910
This was a pretty dopey episode. I felt like it was mainly to
help new viewers understand what the point of the Dragon Balls
were, even though people who had been watching it know.

  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 34 - Cruel General Red
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 34 - Cruel General Red20150910
This is a weird episode, because the previous one ended with a
"cliff-hanger", but this one doesn't show how Goku got down and
was okay. I'm amazed that the Flying Nimbus is gone... it seems
like it has to miraculously come back like Goku's tail.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 35 - Cold Reception20150910

wise English translators. :)

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 36 - Major Metallitron
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 36 - Major Metallitron20150910
It's really funny that this guy is definitely modeled after
Arnold's character in The Terminator. The Kamehameha Wave is much
more powerful than it has been in the past.

  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (10)
entry.content:
Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (10)20150909
I tried the Vicar a few times and did a little grinding against
the wolves in Old Yharnum. I did okay on one fight, mainly because
I got in a visceral attack. I eventually made a mistake against
the wolves and lost about 22k echoes in the Vicar boss arena. It
was actually kind of a blessing, because I should have really
moved on and come back later. I went to the Hemwick area and
unlocked all the shortcuts and am on my way to try the boss there.

Total time: 14:25
  • Video Games
  • Bloodborne
  • PS4
  • 2015

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 30 - Pilaf and the Mystery Force
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 30 - Pilaf and the Mystery Force20150909

reminds us of the old characters. I think it's great that the guy
has a whole chest full of fake Dragon Balls.

entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 28 - The Final Blow20150905

the Moon is just gone though. I wonder if they will do another
tournament in four years time in the show?

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 29 - The Roaming Lake
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 29 - The Roaming Lake20150905
This was a pretty weak episode. There's nothing important that
happens in it, besides reminding us of some of the characters
from the tournament. The only interesting thing is that Goku can
easily do a Kamehameha to get something done.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Book: His Majesty's Dragon, by Naomi Novik (2006)
entry.content:
Book: His Majesty's Dragon, by Naomi Novik (2006)20150905
I really like this book. The world is so interesting and really
brings you in to it very quickly. I love the idea of dragons in the
age of the Napoleonic Wars. The writing is quite good and I find
the main character to be interesting. It is especially interesting
that the dragons talk and have personalities. I think it will do a
lot to make the story last.
  • Books
  • 2006

entry.title: Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (8)
entry.content:
Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (8)20150904
I did a little grinding and explored the rest of the Cathedral
Ward. I've upgraded my Holy Blade a lot as well. I fought the
Vicar and got it down to about 35 or 40%. I think that with a
little more practice I will take it down. My pattern tends to be
to fight it, get one level, then fight it again and repeat.

Total time: 14:04

  • PS4
